summary:
• Estonia admits it has no contingency plan in place to handle potential consequences of Ukraine falling under Russian control.
• The admission highlights the country's vulnerability to regional instability and uncertainty.
• The lack of a backup plan raises concerns about Estonia's ability to respond effectively to emerging crises.

• France pays tribute to a nurse dubbed the "Angel of Dien Bien Phu".
• A suspect is arrested in connection with a foiled Olympic Games attack.
• Russia is excluded from D-Day 80th anniversary commemorations.

• A German anti-Islam activist was attacked with a knife.
• The attacker left six people wounded.
• The incident occurred in Germany.

• A volcanic eruption in Iceland has produced mesmerizing lava rivers.
• The eruption is occurring in Iceland.
• Lava rivers have been formed due to the volcanic activity.

• Confusion surrounds India's T20 World Cup selection process due to conflicting signals.
• Electoral irregularities have been reported in India's recent voting process.
• Heatwave conditions lead to water shortages across India.

• Israeli troops withdrew from Jabalya in Gaza.
• The US proposed a new ceasefire plan for Gaza.
• The situation in Rafah is escalating, with eyewitness accounts of devastating strikes.

• A growing number of women are vying to become Mexico's first female president.
• They aim to address issues such as gender inequality, corruption, and economic development in the country.

• The Philippine government has warned China against "acts of war" amid escalating tensions over territorial disputes in the South China Sea.
• The warning comes after China's recent actions have been seen as provocative by the Philippines.
• The two countries have long had disagreements over their overlapping claims to islands and waters in the region.

• The African National Congress (ANC) is expected to experience its worst electoral performance since its inception due to internal divisions and corruption allegations.
• The party faces the possibility of losing its majority in parliament for the first time, which may lead to coalition governments or minority administrations.
• Preliminary election results indicate a significant decline in support for the ANC, with opposition parties potentially gaining control of key provinces and municipalities.

• Ukraine struggles in its ongoing conflict
• Coordination between Kyiv and Western allies is challenging
• The situation remains difficult

• "Twice I backed Trump but no more" - voters split on verdict
• UK ambassador resigns amid scandal over pointing gun at staff
• U.K. Parliament dissolved ahead of elections

• Joe Biden announces an Israeli proposal to end the Gaza conflict.
• Michelle Obama mourns the loss of her mother, Marian Robinson, who has died aged 86.
• Former President Donald Trump faces criticism from voters over his handling of the presidency.
